analysis.description:
GenericCrowdsale.loadRefund (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#435-444) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-investedAmountOf[msg.sender].add(excedent) (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#444)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#1129-1137):
	External calls:
	- token.setMintAgent(address(this),true) (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#1136-1137)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiFundingCap (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#1137)

Reentrancy in GenericCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#387-395):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale(token) (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#393-395)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#395)

Reentrancy in GenericCrowdsale.preallocate (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#327-337):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens.mul(10 ** uint256(token.decimals())) (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#332-334)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#336-337)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#336-337)
	- tokensSold (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#336-337)
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#336-337)

Reentrancy in GenericCrowdsale.setFinalizeAgent (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#419-423):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(address(addr) == 0 || addr.isFinalizeAgent()) (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#421)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalizeAgent (/unique_contracts/0x17b7ddd2962226ef9428313ed62799060fb812b7.sol#421-423)
